name: Dash a Punch
description:
Note: Press Space to Jump when on the ground and Dash when in the air "Dash your way through"

Dash a Punch is an action-platformer where you must dash through the challenges in the levels.

Dash a Punch has:-

  • 30 Unique Levels.
  • 3 Little Characters.
  • A lot of fun.

Availability:-

It's currently only available on the Google Play Store but will soon be available in other stores.
